name: CMGT_Condition_EvaluationForIntegerAndDecimalFields
sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!conditionType: ri!condition[recordType!CMGT_Condition.valueType],
  local!valueJson: index(
    rule!CMGT_UTIL_CastJsonToMap(
      jsonText: ri!condition[recordType!CMGT_Condition.valueJson]
    ),
    "value",
    null
  ),
  local!value: a!match(
    value: local!conditionType,
    equals: "DECIMAL",
    then: todecimal(local!valueJson),
    default: tointeger(local!valueJson)
  ),
  local!runTimeValue: rule!CMGT_AUTO_EVAL_returnRuntimeValue(
    data: ri!data,
    field: ri!field
  ),
  /*Evaluation logic based on condition type*/
  local!castValue: a!match(
    value: local!conditionType,
    equals: "DECIMAL",
    then: a!defaultValue(todecimal(local!runTimeValue), ""),
    default: a!defaultValue(tointeger(local!runTimeValue), "")
  ),
  a!match(
    value: ri!condition[recordType!CMGT_Condition.operator],
    equals: cons!CMGT_TXT_AUTOMATION_OPERATOR_INCLUDES,
    then: contains(local!castValue, local!value),
    equals: cons!CMGT_TXT_AUTOMATION_OPERATOR_DOES_NOT_INCLUDE,
    then: not(contains(local!castValue, local!value)),
    equals: cons!CMGT_TXT_AUTOMATION_OPERATOR_EQUAL_TO,
    then: local!castValue = local!value,
    equals: cons!CMGT_TXT_AUTOMATION_OPERATOR_NOT_EQUAL_TO,
    then: local!castValue <> local!value,
    equals: cons!CMGT_TXT_AUTOMATION_OPERATOR_LESS_THAN,
    /*if the case value is null return false*/
    then: if(
      rule!CMGT_UTIL_IsNotBlank(local!castValue),
      local!castValue < local!value,
      false()
    ),
    equals: cons!CMGT_TXT_AUTOMATION_OPERATOR_LESS_THAN_OR_EQUAL,
    /*if the case value is null return false*/
    then: if(
      rule!CMGT_UTIL_IsNotBlank(local!castValue),
      local!castValue <= local!value,
      false()
    ),
    equals: cons!CMGT_TXT_AUTOMATION_OPERATOR_GREATER_THAN,
    then: local!castValue > local!value,
    equals: cons!CMGT_TXT_AUTOMATION_OPERATOR_GREATER_THAN_OR_EQUAL,
    then: local!castValue >= local!value,
    equals: cons!CMGT_TXT_AUTOMATION_OPERATOR_IS_NULL,
    then: rule!CMGT_UTIL_IsBlank(value: local!castValue),
    equals: cons!CMGT_TXT_AUTOMATION_OPERATOR_IS_NOT_NULL,
    then: rule!CMGT_UTIL_IsNotBlank(input: local!castValue),
    default: false
  )
)
